visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with each month labeled appropriately. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors for the series and include settings for chart margins, background, and legend.

subtitle.text: When resizing the window or the frame, the chart should not resize

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart is set to not resize when the window or frame is resized, and it has a light gray background with specific margins for better spacing. The axes and labels are styled with custom colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The data series represents the monthly average temperature for a year, with each month labeled on the x-axis. The series is colored with a tomato red shade for visual distinction. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart.
